title: Code.org CS Ambassador Program - Training Survey

elements.name: intro_text
elements.html:
Thank you for being a Code.org Ambassador!

Your leadership will make a meaningful impact for young women in CS!

To get to know you better, we ask that you please take 2 minutes to share some information about your CS experience. This step is required for your participation in the program and the data will be used by the program managers to better support you.

elements.name: teacher_account
elements.title: Are you logged in to your teacher account?
elements.description: If you are logged into your teacher account, the header bars are purple, if you are logged into your student account, the header bars are teal

choices.text: Yes, I am logged into my teacher account
No, I am logged into my student account

elements.name: student_account
elements.html:
Please sign out and sign back in using your teacher account credentials

Remember that you should sign in using your Code.org teacher account for all activities you do as an ambassador.

elements.name: cs_experience
elements.title: What Computer Science classes have you taken or are currently taking?

choices.text: Introduction to Computer Science (In High School)
Introduction to Computer Science (In Middle School)

elements.name: cs_experience_other
elements.title: What other Computer Science classes have you taken?

elements.name: hosted_hoc_event
elements.title: Did you host an Hour of Code event at your school during Computer Science Education Week?

elements.name: ap_exam
elements.title: Have you taken an AP Computer Science exam?

elements.name: other_feedback_FR

elements.name: demographics_header
elements.html:
Demographic Information

This last question gathers demographic information for reporting purposes.

elements.name: race
elements.title: What is your racial or ethnic identity?

choices.text: Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander

elements.name: cdo_heart_you
elements.html: Thanks from Code.org for your time, commitment and passion for Computer Science.
